text: akkaranattal israyel santatikaleatu nam kalpiccu: "areyenkilum keannatinea bhumiyil kulappamuntakkiyatinea allate vallavanum orale vadhiccal avan muluvan manusyareyum vadhiccavaneppealeyan. oralute jivan raksiccal muluvan manusyaruteyum jivan raksiccavaneppealeyum.” nam'mute dutanmar vyaktamaya telivukalumayi avarute atutt vannittuntayirunnu. ennitt pinneyum avarilereperum bhumiyil atikramam pravarttikkunnavaran
